required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Variations in Palatability and Portion Size of Vegetables on Meal Intake of Preschool Children
clinical_study.official_title: Lunchtime Meal Feeding Study for Preschool Children

collaborator.agency: National Institute of Diabetes and Digestive and Kidney Diseases (NIDDK)

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of the study is to determine the effect of varying both the palatability and portion size of vegetables served to preschool children at a meal on the outcomes of food and energy intake at the meal.

primary_outcome.measure: Difference between interventions in vegetable intake
primary_outcome.description: Weight of vegetables consumed at the meal (g)

secondary_outcome.measure: Difference between interventions in food intake
secondary_outcome.description: Weight of food consumed at the meal (g)

secondary_outcome.measure: Difference between interventions in meal energy intake
Difference between interventions in meal energy density
secondary_outcome.description: Energy density of the food consumed at the meal (kcal/g)

other_outcome.measure: Preference of vegetables served at the meal
other_outcome.description: Preferred version of vegetables (1=standard palatability, 2=enhanced palatability)

other_outcome.measure: Liking of all foods served at the meal
other_outcome.description: The Yummy-Yucky Cartoon Faces Scale (1=Yucky, 2=Just Okay, and 3=Yummy)

other_outcome.measure: Ranking of all foods served at the meal
other_outcome.description: Ranking of all foods in order of preference (1= most preferred, 2= next most preferred, etc.)

arm_group.arm_group_label: Standard Palatability and Standard Portion Size
arm_group.description: Vegetables with Standard Palatability and Standard Portion Size

arm_group.arm_group_label: Standard Palatability and Larger Portion Size
arm_group.description: Vegetables with Standard Palatability and Larger Portion Size

arm_group.arm_group_label: Enhanced Palatability and Standard Portion Size
arm_group.description: Vegetables with Enhanced Palatability and Standard Portion Size

arm_group.arm_group_label: Enhanced Palatability and Larger Portion Size
arm_group.description: Vegetables with Enhanced Palatability and Larger Portion Size

intervention.intervention_name: Plain Vegetables Served in 100% Portion Size
intervention.description: Lunch includes (a) vegetables without added flavoring (b) the baseline portion size of vegetables
intervention.arm_group_label: Standard Palatability and Standard Portion Size

intervention.intervention_name: Plain Vegetables Served in 200% Portion Size
intervention.description: Lunch includes (a) vegetables without added flavoring (b) 200% of the baseline portion size of vegetables
intervention.arm_group_label: Standard Palatability and Larger Portion Size

intervention.intervention_name: Enhanced Vegetables Served in 100% Portion Size
intervention.description: Lunch includes (a) vegetables with added flavoring (b) the baseline portion size of vegetables
intervention.arm_group_label: Enhanced Palatability and Standard Portion Size

intervention.intervention_name: Enhanced Vegetables Served in 200% Portion Size
intervention.description: Lunch includes (a) vegetables with added flavoring (b) 200% of the baseline portion size of vegetables
intervention.arm_group_label: Enhanced Palatability and Larger Portion Size

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Children who are enrolled in a scheduled classroom of the designated childcare centers
Exclusion Criteria:
- Children who are allergic to any of the foods served
- Children whose diets exclude any of the foods served
- Children who will not be present at the childcare center for all of the scheduled study days

facility.name: Laboratory for the Study of Human Ingestive Behavior, The Pennsylvania State University

responsible_party.investigator_title: Professor of Nutrition and Director of the Laboratory for the Study Human Ingestive Behavior
